name: Tomato and roasted red pepper soup
author: Pooja
description: Spice up a classic tomato soup with roasted red peppers.

actions.step: Place tomatoes, red bell peppers, garlic, and basil on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for ~30 minutes.
Blend together tomatoes, bell peppers, garlic, and basil while adding vegetable stock.
